scripts.dashboard:server:build: esbuild lib/dashboard/server/index.js --bundle --outdir=dist/dashboard/server --platform=node --target=node20 --format=esm --banner:js="import { createRequire as yix6bKft } from 'module'; const require = yix6bKft(import.meta.url);"
scripts.dashboard:server:dev: esbuild lib/dashboard/server/index.js --bundle --outdir=dist/dashboard/server --platform=node --target=node20 --format=esm --banner:js="import { createRequire as yix6bKft } from 'module'; const require = yix6bKft(import.meta.url);" --watch
scripts.peer:build: esbuild lib/peer/index.js --bundle --outdir=dist/peer --platform=node --target=node20 --format=esm --external:@canvas-js/okra-node --banner:js="import { createRequire as yix6bKft } from 'module'; const require = yix6bKft(import.meta.url);"
scripts.peer:dev: esbuild lib/peer/index.js --bundle --outdir=dist/peer --platform=node --target=node20 --format=esm --external:@canvas-js/okra-node --banner:js="import { createRequire as yix6bKft } from 'module'; const require = yix6bKft(import.meta.url);" --watch
